The video was published on Facebook on J: 2020, and has been shared over 15,000 times and viewed over 305,000 times.
The video includes a superimposed locati: Shaheen Bagh, Okhla, New Delhi," indicating that it was filmed at the protest site.
The video shows locals cheering Irfan Pa: West Bengal on January 14, 2020, as confirmed by other footage shared by Pathan himself on his official social media pages.
The presence of Madan Mitra: a local politician and former sports minister of West Bengal, in both the misleading video and the authentic footage shared by Pathan further verifies that the video is not from the anti-citizenship law protest site at Shaheen Bagh in Delhi.
